resources.string: Giolatto is a traditional Italian ice cream parlor, which currently has six shops located in Marbella, San Pedro Alcántara, Estepona, Málaga, Fuengirola and Seville. The ice cream we produce are natural and fresh, made daily by traditional processes with the best fresh fruit selected.
Following our belief that everyone has the right to enjoy good ice cream, we also make ice cream for people with food intolerances.
